pageContent: Purpose: Of men with very low risk prostate cancer at biopsy recent evidence shows that black American men are at greater risk for adverse oncologic outcomes after radical prostatectomy. We studied radical prostatectomy specimens from black and white men at very low risk to determine whether there are systematic pathological differences.

metaData.source:
Molecular correlates of intermediate- and high-risk localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30103901/
